Package Game.Interfaces

Interface Character

All Known Subinterfaces:
Enemy, Hero
All Known Implementing Classes:
CharacterImp, EnemyImp, HeroImp
public interface Character
Represents a character in the game

    • isInFight

      boolean isInFight()
      Method verifies if the character is in fight
      Returns:
      true if the character is in fight, false otherwise

      void setHealth(double health) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the health of the character
      Parameters:
      health - the health of the character
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if health is negative

      void attack(Character character) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Attacks another character
      Parameters:
      character - the character to attack
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the character is invalid
